nodes.text: The Valfin system was a star system that was located within the Meram sector, which was a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories and New Territories regions. The Valfin labor camps were located in the system, and at some point during the New Republic's reign, it was the site of the Valfin Labor Camps Insurgence.
The Valfin system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square O-4.
